attributes.action: refuse access to all foreign immigrants, asylum seekers and migrant workers on the basis that the UK economy cannot cope with the influx.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's time to stop being the good guy of Europe and start to display some backbone. Our nation cannot cope!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
